casebody.data:
Greg ABBOTT, Governor of Texas, et al., Applicants
v.
Shannon PEREZ, et al. No. 17A245. Supreme Court of the United States Aug. 31, 2017.

ORDER

SAMUEL A. ALITO, JR., Associate Justice.

UPON CONSIDERATION of the application of counsel for the applicants,

IT IS ORDERED that the order of the United States District Court for the Western District of Texas, case No. SA-11-CV-360, entered August 24, 2017, is hereby stayed pending receipt of a response, due on or before Thursday, September 7, 2017, by 3 p.m., and further order of the undersigned or of the Court.
